mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(id),0) from unit_fac t where t.service_id = #{serviceId}

select t.*, us.name serviceDepart, sc.value supervisionCategoryValue, ft.value typeValue, fs.value statusValue, rs.value reviewStatusValue, ps.value permitSituationValue from unit_fac t left join unit_service_depart us on t.service_id = us.id left join config_fac_supervison_category sc on t.supervision_category_id = sc.id left join config_fac_type ft on t.type_id = ft.id left join config_fac_status fs on t.status_id = fs.id left join config_review_status rs on t.review_status_id = rs.id left join config_fac_permit_situation ps on t.fac_permit_situation_id = ps.id where t.id = #{id}

select t.id from unit_fac t where t.id = #{id} and not exists(select 1 from unit_fac_improve a where a.fac_id = t.id) and not exists(select 1 from unit_fac_report b where b.fac_id = t.id) and not exists(select 1 from permit_fac c where c.fac_id = t.id)
select * from unit_fac t where t.service_id = #{serviceId}
